TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IToolboxService

summary.span: 提供在开发环境下管理和查询工具箱的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties to manage and query the toolbox in the development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供用于添加和移除工具箱项和工具箱创建器回调委托、序列化和反序列化工具箱项以及检索工具箱状态信息和管理工具箱状态的属性和方法。The interface provides properties and methods for adding and removing toolbox items and toolbox creator callback delegates, serializing and deserializing toolbox items, and retrieving toolbox state information and managing toolbox state. 可以通过以下方法检索有关工具箱内容的信息:You can retrieve information about the contents of the toolbox with the following methods: - 属性指示工具箱中当前可用的类别。The property indicates the categories currently available on the toolbox. - 属性指示当前选定的工具箱类别。The property indicates the currently selected toolbox category. - 方法检索工具箱中的项, 并根据指定的工具箱类别进行筛选。The method retrieves the items on the toolbox, optionally filtered by a specified toolbox category. - 方法检索当前选定的。 The method retrieves the currently selected . - 方法选择指定的作为当前工具箱项。 The method selects the specified as the current toolbox item. - 方法指示指定的序列化对象 (如果它是) 是否支持指定的设计器宿主, 或者它是否与指定的特性相匹配。 The method indicates whether the specified serialized object, if it is a , is supported by the specified designer host, or whether it matches the specified attributes. - 方法指示指定的序列化对象是否为。 The method indicates whether the specified serialized object is a . 可以通过以下方法添加和移除工具箱项:You can add and remove toolbox items with the following methods: - 方法将添加到"工具箱",如果指定的类别不存在,则创建该类别 (可选)。The method adds a to the toolbox, creating the optionally specified category if it does not exist. - 方法将仅对当前项目启用的添加到"工具箱"。 The method adds a that is only enabled for the current project to the toolbox. - 方法移除指定的。 The method removes the specified . - 方法添加一个委托, 该委托能够将存储在 "工具箱" 中的某些类型的数据转换为。 The method adds a delegate capable of converting some type of data stored on the toolbox to a . - 方法移除指定数据类型的所有委托。 The method removes any delegates for the specified data type. 您可以刷新工具箱, 将工具箱项标记为 "已使用", 或使用以下方法将鼠标光标设置为表示当前工具箱项的光标:You can refresh the toolbox, mark a toolbox item as used, or set the mouse cursor to a cursor that represents the current toolbox item using the following methods: - 方法刷新工具箱显示, 以反映工具箱项的当前状态。The method refreshes the toolbox display to reflect the current state of the toolbox items. - 方法指示工具箱已使用所选工具箱项。The method signals the toolbox that the selected toolbox item has been used. - 方法将鼠标光标设置为表示当前工具箱项的光标。The method sets the mouse cursor to a cursor that represents the current toolbox item. 您可以使用工具箱通过以下方法序列化或反序列化工具箱项:You can use the toolbox to serialize or deserialize a toolbox item using the following methods: - 此方法尝试从指定的序列化工具箱项对象返回。The method attempts to return a from the specified serialized toolbox item object. - 方法返回一个序列化的对象, 该对象表示指定的。 The method returns a serialized object representing the specified . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在设计模式下使用来列出和选择工具箱类别和项, 以及从工具箱项创建组件或控件, 并将其添加到中。The following code example demonstrates the use of the in design mode to list and select toolbox categories and items, and to create components or controls from toolbox items and add them to a . 若要使用此示例, 请将代码编译为程序集, 并在 Windows 窗体应用程序中添加对程序集的引用。To use the example, compile the code to an assembly, and add a reference to the assembly in a Windows Forms application. 如果使用的`IToolboxServiceControl`是 Visual Studio, 会自动将添加到 "**工具箱**"。If you are using Visual Studio, the `IToolboxServiceControl` is automatically added to the **Toolbox**. 在窗体上创建`IToolboxServiceControl`的实例, 以测试其行为。Create an instance of the `IToolboxServiceControl` on a form to test its behavior. [!code-cpp[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/CPP/itoolboxservicecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/CS/itoolboxservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxServiceExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxServiceExample1/VB/itoolboxservicecontrol.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了一个组件, 该组件使用向 "工具箱" 添加 "文本" 数据格式处理程序或。The following code example provides a component that uses the to add a "Text" data format handler, or , to the toolbox. 数据创建器回调委托将粘贴到工具箱中的任何文本数据传递到窗体上, 并将其拖到一个自定义中, 该自定义用于创建包含文本的。The data creator callback delegate passes any text data pasted to the toolbox and dragged onto a form to a custom that creates a containing the text. [!code-cpp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CPP/textdatatextboxcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/CS/textdatatextboxcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ToolboxCreatorCallbackSample/VB/textdatatextboxcomponent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式添加新的工具箱项创建者。

span.span: Adds a new toolbox item creator for a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱项创建者可将在 "工具箱" 中粘贴或删除的特定数据格式的数据转换为。A toolbox item creator can convert data of a particular data format that has been pasted or dropped on the toolbox into a . 如果创建者处理多种格式, 则多次调用 。If a creator handles more than one format, call more than once. 如果为同一格式添加多个创建者, 可能会产生意外行为。Unexpected behavior may result if you add more than one creator for the same format.

summary.span: 为指定的数据格式和设计器宿主添加新的工具箱项创建者。

span.span: Adds a new toolbox item creator for a specified data format and designer host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱项创建者可将在 "工具箱" 中粘贴或删除的特定数据格式的数据转换为。A toolbox item creator can convert data of a particular data format that has been pasted or dropped on the toolbox into a . 如果创建者处理多种格式, 则多次调用 。If a creator handles more than one format, call more than once. 如果为同一格式添加多个创建者, 可能会产生意外行为。Unexpected behavior may result if you add more than one creator for the same format. `null`如果将`host`参数设置为, 则创建者将可供所有设计器使用。If the `host` parameter is set to `null`, the creator will be available to all designers. 如果提供了设计器宿主, 则创建者将仅对使用指定宿主的设计器可用。If a designer host is supplied, the creator will only be available to designers using the specified host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 刷新工具箱项的状态。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the toolbox items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于向工具箱服务指示用户要更新工具箱项的缓存。The method is used to indicate to the toolbox service that the user wants to update the cache of toolbox items. 如果工具箱服务维护工具箱项容器的实时列表, 则此方法将不执行任何操作。If the toolbox service maintains a live list of toolbox item containers, then this method will do nothing. 如果它维护工具箱项容器的快照, 则调用此方法应确保快照是最新的。If it maintains a snapshot of toolbox item containers, calling this method should ensure that the snapshot is up to date.

summary.span: 移除以前添加的工具箱项创建者。
